'''Enigmatic Page (VI)''' is a Quest Item obtained from an investigation point in the [[Institute of Natural Philosophy]]. It can be deciphered at [[Canotila and the Book of Revealing]].

==Location==
The room containing the investigation point can be accessed by entering the water stream<!--proper term?--> by the Ruin Guard to reach the second floor, then activating the mechanism by the door.
<gallery>
Item Enigmatic Page (VI) Location.png|Location
Item Enigmatic Page (VI) Location Context.png|Additional Context 
</gallery>

==Text==
...In the expedition to [[Petrichor]] and the [[Faded Castle|ruins]] from before... we discovered... origin. It seems that compared to humans, [[Oceanid|we]]...<br>
If... all [[Primordial Sea|return]] to... transcend. Although anti-intellectual and counter-intuitive,... the ancients [[Praetorian Golem|succeeded]] before...

[Most of the remaining content cannot be deciphered due to the thoughts expressed being utterly incoherent.]
